'''''Penalty''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to make a [[Hilichurl Grenadier]] dig out a [[Pyro Slime]] in the water.

==Gameplay Notes==
* The water must be shallow so that the Hilichurl does not drown.
